content.html: Dear white friends and folks, Might I suggest that the next time you feel like questioning if something is, in fact, racist or hurtful to people of colour, you journal your thoughts in a diary and spare them from Twitter? Yours exhaustedly, A Very Tired Black Women
content.value:
Dear white friends and folks,

Might I suggest that the next time you feel like questioning if something is, in fact, racist or hurtful to people of colour, you journal your thoughts in a diary and spare them from Twitter?

Yours exhaustedly,
A Very Tired Black Women
